DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, open-label, dose-exploration and dose-expansion study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, antitumor activity, PK and immunogenicity of MEDI4736 in combination with tremelimumab in subjects with select advanced solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of MEDI4736 in Combination With Tremelimumab in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects 18 years and older Histologic confirmation of advanced solid tumors Subjects must have recurrent/metastatic disease and may have been previously treated in the recurrent/metastatic setting. Any concurrent chemotherapy, immunemediated therapy or biologic or hormonal therapy for cancer treatment Active or prior documented autoimmune disease within the past 2 years Current or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days with some exceptions.
